unnormalised: Entertainment News: Music Streaming Wars Heat Up – And My Data Bill Is Crying
normalised: Entertainment News: Music Streaming Wars Heat Up – And My Data Bill Is Crying

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26th - The battle for your eardrums is officially ON! Music streaming services are unleashing the Bollywood anthems and Bhangra beats to lure subscribers, and my poor data bill is suffering.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty sixth - The battle for your eardrums is officially ON! Music streaming services are unleashing the Bollywood anthems and Bhangra beats to lure subscribers, and my poor data bill is suffering.

unnormalised: Gaana, JioSaavn, Spotify – they're all fighting harder than a Karan Johar movie sibling rivalry for a slice of the Desi pie. Reports suggest a new "Premium Plus Ultra" tier is coming to one unnamed platform, promising lossless audio so pure you can practically hear Pandit Ravi Shankar's sitar strings being plucked.
normalised: Gaana, JioSaavn, Spotify – they're all fighting harder than a Karan Johar movie sibling rivalry for a slice of the Desi pie. Reports suggest a new "Premium Plus Ultra" tier is coming to one unnamed platform, promising lossless audio so pure you can practically hear Pandit Ravi Shankar's sitar strings being plucked.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, another service is rumored to be developing AI that will curate playlists based on your astrological sign. Because apparently, being a Virgo dictates a craving for 90s remixes.
normalised: Meanwhile, another service is rumored to be developing A I that will curate playlists based on your astrological sign. Because apparently, being a Virgo dictates a craving for nineties remixes.

unnormalised: My ears are happy, my phone's storage is not (thanks to all those offline downloads), and my wallet is weeping like Kajol in Kuch Kuch Hota Hai. Guess I'll be eating Maggi for the next month to afford this audio extravaganza. Maybe I should start streaming my own Tabla lessons to recoup the losses.
